title-group.article-title: FORME DELLA COMPARAZIONE E TEORIA SOCIALE

abstract.p: Comparative analysis is taken into account in relation to recent changes in social theory. By distinguishing different ways of doing comparative research, their limits and potentialities, the A. highlights the close link between social theory and empirical research. More precisely, the A. holds that only after a critical re-examination of this link it is possible to explain the role played by comparative analysis on the theory of social action during the last decades.
